```{=html}
<script>
// Funci칩n para mostrar/ocultar TODO el c칩digo
function toggleAllCode() {
  var codeContainers = document.querySelectorAll('.code-container');
  var button = document.querySelector('.floating-code-btn');
  var allHidden = true;
  
  // Verificar si alg칰n c칩digo est치 visible
  codeContainers.forEach(function(container) {
    if (container.style.display === 'block') {
      allHidden = false;
    }
  });
  
  // Mostrar u ocultar todo
  codeContainers.forEach(function(container) {
    if (allHidden) {
      container.style.display = 'block';
    } else {
      container.style.display = 'none';
    }
  });
  
  // Cambiar texto del bot칩n
  if (allHidden) {
    button.innerHTML = '游닇 Ocultar Todo el C칩digo';
  } else {
    button.innerHTML = '游닇 Mostrar Todo el C칩digo';
  }
}
</script>
```

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)

# =============================================================================
# CONFIGURACI칍N AUTOM츼TICA PARA GR츼FICOS GGPLOT2
# =============================================================================

# Tema personalizado que se aplicar치 autom치ticamente
theme_custom <- function() {
  theme_minimal(base_family = "Segoe UI") +
    theme(
      # Textos y t칤tulos
      plot.title = element_text(
        size = 18, 
        face = "bold", 
        color = "#488B49",
        hjust = 0.5,
        margin = margin(b = 10)
      ),
      plot.subtitle = element_text(
        size = 14, 
        color = "#6c757d",
        hjust = 0.5,
        margin = margin(b = 15)
      ),
      axis.title = element_text(
        size = 12, 
        color = "#488B49",
        face = "bold"
      ),
      axis.text = element_text(
        size = 10, 
        color = "#333333"
      ),
      legend.title = element_text(
        color = "#488B49",
        face = "bold"
      ),
      legend.text = element_text(
        color = "#333333"
      ),
      
      # Fondos y grids
      plot.background = element_rect(fill = "#f8f9fa", color = NA),
      panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white", color = NA),
      panel.grid.major = element_line(color = "#e9ecef", linewidth = 0.5),
      panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
      legend.background = element_rect(fill = "white", color = NA),
      
      # M치rgenes
      plot.margin = margin(20, 20, 20, 20),
      panel.spacing = unit(1, "lines")
    )
}

# Aplicar el tema autom치ticamente a TODOS los gr치ficos ggplot2
theme_set(theme_custom())

# Paleta de colores personalizada
colores_personalizados <- c(
  "#488B49", "#73e2a7", "#2d5534", "#1c7c54", "#b1cf5f", 
  "#3a6e3a", "#5a9e5a", "#7ab07a", "#9ac29a", "#bad4ba"
)

# Funciones para usar la paleta autom치ticamente
scale_color_custom <- function(...) {
  scale_color_manual(..., values = colores_personalizados)
}

scale_fill_custom <- function(...) {
  scale_fill_manual(..., values = colores_personalizados)
}

# =============================================================================
# CONFIGURACI칍N AUTOM츼TICA PARA TABLAS
# =============================================================================

# Funci칩n para tablas autom치ticamente estilizadas
kable_custom <- function(data, caption = NULL, ...) {
  kable(data, caption = caption, ...) %>%
    kable_styling(
      bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed"),
      full_width = FALSE,
      position = "center",
      font_size = 14,
      html_font = "Segoe UI",
      class = "professional-table"  # Esta clase activa nuestro CSS
    )
}

# Sobrescribir la funci칩n kable por defecto
kable <- kable_custom

# =============================================================================
# CONFIGURACI칍N PARA GR츼FICOS BASE DE R
# =============================================================================

# Configurar par치metros por defecto para gr치ficos base
par_default <- list(
  family = "Segoe UI",
  bg = "#f8f9fa",
  col = "#488B49",
  col.axis = "#333333",
  col.lab = "#488B49",
  fg = "#488B49",
  font.main = 2,  # bold
  font.lab = 2,   # bold
  cex.main = 1.2,
  cex.lab = 1.1
)

# Aplicar par치metros por defecto
invisible(list2env(par_default, envir = .GlobalEnv))
```
